metadata.title: CVE-2015-2684 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Shibboleth Service Provider (SP) before 2.5.4 allows remote authenticatedusers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted SAML message.

criterions.comment: shibboleth-sp2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
